text: The sapphire-throated hummingbird Lepidopyga coeruleogularis is a bright metallic-green hummingbird found in Panama, Colombia.The Birds of Panama. Zona Tropical. Cornell University Press. 2010, p148. ISBN 978-0-8014-7674-7 More recently, it is seen in Costa Rica. ==References== Category:IUCN Red List least concern species Category:Hummingbirds Category:Birds of South America Category:Birds of Central America
title: Sapphire-throated hummingbird
